summary: Behold... The Horn of Plenty. Distributing cheese, sweetrolls and other delicacies to Dragonborn everywhere. (Not Miraak, though.)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b630/Matthiaswagg/HornOfPlenty-Cornucopia_zps6445fac3.png[/img]
Horn Of Plenty - Cornucopia (AKA Endless Plenty) is a bit of a nonsense mod. It's completely balanced, but it is by no means a huge mod nor one that I will have an interest in adding to. It adds a Nordic Horn, called the Cornucopia, to Bloated Man's Grotto. You can find it right by Bolar's Oathblade. When activated in your inventory, it will bestow upon you a random piece of food from a 40 or so large randomized list of foods. Then, it will be inactive for 12 hours until it is "replenished" and you may use it again. Like said, it IS balanced in the sense that you can't spam food. Perhaps it will be useful to some of you, or not. It's just something I made that I figured perhaps one or two people would be interested in.

[size=4]Requirements

[/size]Skyrim
[color=#ff0000]No DLCs are required. Hearthfire foods are NOT included.

[/color][size=4]Installation

[/size]Like any other mod. I recommend you get a mod manager if you don't have one already.

[size=4]FAQ

[/size][color=#f1c232]Q: Conflicts? Compatibility issues?[/color]
A: This mod has one small edit. It adds the Cornucopia to Bloated Man's Grotto, which DOES edit that cell. If something else edits it, just load it after this mod and add the Cornucopia by console. Just use help cornucopia to find it.[/center][center][color=#f1c232]Q: Why am I getting so many sweet rolls and cheese wheels? I thought this was supposed to be randomized?[/color]
A: It IS randomized. But the list has 52 entries, and only 40 foods in it. I may have weighted the randomization in favor of sweet rolls and cheese wheels [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k8m6_dqvORY]EVER SO SLIGHTLY[/url].

[color=#f1c232]Q: I just got a bunch of cheese wheels from the Cornucopia. What is this!!?[/color]
A: Yeah. You must have used it at least 100 times then. Well done. *applause* I'm surprised you've gotten that much enjoyment out of the Cornucopia, honestly.

[color=#f1c232]Q: Will you add a spell where you wield the Cornucopia and it shoots out food?[/color]
A: No. I've got no spell skills. If you want to, feel free to use the assets to create it as long as you require this mod.

[color=#f1c232]Q: Will you add ______?[/color]
A: No.

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4995004/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Other Mods[/url]
[/size](No, they're not as silly/small as this one.)[/center]
author: Mattiewagg
